Infectra



*Infectra sighs*


Infectra: "Than where are we heading?"


*In=
fectra asks Airbomber*

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  =
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, August 15, 2000 5:08 PM
  Subject:=
 Re: Airbomber and Infectra...


  "I'm not going back! I am not going to s=
pend the rest of my life in that base with nothing to do! I say we go out a=
nd make something of life, while we still have life left to live." Airbombe=
r said. OOC: Sorry for my absense everyone, but you probably didn't notice =
that I was gone yesterday...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: il=
ovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, August 13, 200=
0 7:05 PM
    Subject: Re: Airbomber and Infectra...


    Infectra


    *=
Infectra sighs and looks around*


    Infectra:  "I guess we should go bac=
k to base."

    *Infectra says to Airbomber*

      ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Sund=
ay, August 13, 2000 2:28 AM
      Subject: Re: Airbomber and Infectra...


=
      Airbomber sighs and starts to fall asleep from boredom...
        ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrp=
g@egroups.com 
        Sent: Sunday, August 13, 2000 1:18 AM
        Subjec=
t: Re: Airbomber and Infectra...


        Infectra


        Infectra:  "H=
mm....There are only two of us and there could be many of them. I'm not sur=
e."


        *Infectra says to Airbomber*

          ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
       =
   Sent: Sunday, August 13, 2000 1:12 AM
          Subject: Re: Airbomber a=
nd Infectra...


          Airbomber honestly didn't know where to go.

   =
       "Want to attack a base?" Airbomber asked Infectra...
            ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
            From: ilovealllizards 
            T=
o: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Saturday, August 12, 2000 8:50 PM
=
            Subject: Re: Airbomber and Infectra...


            Infectra

=
             
             
            *Infectra begins walking while look=
ing around herself*

            Infectra:  "Are we going in any place part=
icular?"

            *Infectra asks Airbomber*

              ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
              From: THECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egr=
oups.com 
              Sent: Saturday, August 12, 2000 7:05 PM
           =
   Subject: Re: Airbomber and Infectra...


              Airbomber took In=
fectra's hand and started to walk...
                ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
                From: ilovealllizards 
                To: nbwrpg@e=
groups.com 
                Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 10:21 PM
        =
        Subject: Re: Airbomber and Infectra...


                Infectra

=

                Infectra: "I don't know, I guess he just doesn't want to c=
ome.."


                *Infectra says to Airbomber while frowning*
      =
            ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: THECODE 
=
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Friday, A=
ugust 11, 2000 10:11 PM
                  Subject: Re: Airbomber and Infect=
ra...


                  "Okay. Hey, Stranato!" Airbomber called.

       =
           "Go away! Having fun with friends!" Stranato called out.

      =
            "I thought we were his friends." Airbomber said sadly...
      =
              ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From: ilove=
alllizards 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                   =
 Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 9:55 PM
                    Subject: Re: Air=
bomber w/ Infectra...


                    Infectra

                    *=
Infectra leaves the base and stands next to Airbomber and starts thinking*
=


                    Infectra: "Umm...Should we see if anyone else wants t=
o go with us?"

                    *Infectra asks Airbomber with a smile*
=

                      ----- Original Message ----- 
                      =
From: THECODE 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              =
        Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 9:38 PM
                      Subject=
: Re: Airbomber w/ Infectra...


                      Airbomber left the b=
ase and looked off into the distance. He started to feel bad about this, th=
ey didn't have any friends to help them if they got into trouble...
       =
                 ----- Original Message ----- 
                        From=
: ilovealllizards 
                        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        =
                Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 8:36 PM
                     =
   Subject: Re: Airbomber w/ Infectra...


                        Infectra=


                        *Infectra smiles*

                        Infect=
ra: "Indeed, we shall be off."

                        *Infectra says to A=
irbomber as she opens the door leading out of their room*

                =
          ----- Original Message ----- 
                          From: THE=
CODE 
                          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                   =
       Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 6:40 PM
                          Subj=
ect: Re: Airbomber w/ Infectra...


                          Airbomber tak=
es her hand.

                          "We can make the Maximals proud." A=
irbomber said...
                            ----- Original Message ----- 
=
                            From: ilovealllizards 
                        =
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                            Sent: Friday, Augus=
t 11, 2000 4:24 AM
                            Subject: Re: Airbomber w/ In=
fectra...


                            Infectra


                        =
    Infectra: "Hmm...Sounds good to me."

                            *Infe=
ctra stands up*

                            Infectra: "Shall we?"

       =
                     *Infectra says to Airbomber smiling holding her hand o=
ut*

                              ----- Original Message ----- 
          =
                    From: THECODE 
                              To: nbwrpg=
@egroups.com 
                              Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 3=
:29 AM
                              Subject: Airbomber w/ Infectra...


  =
                            "So, want to gop outside or something? See the =
world, capture out first Preds?" Airbomber asked Infectra. He lenaed over a=
nd kissed her...
